about_the_game:
Out of Hand is a fast paced action party game with a unique controllable physics based hand, and a very physics based dodge roll. 2-8 players fight to be the last one standing in short rounds on a variety of islands with tons of different and unique items.

Demo Out Now

Play the demo! It's got 10 different maps, online or local multiplayer and probably some bugs we haven't caught yet

Why We Made Out of Hand: Deluxe

We are a team of two friends from Sweden who played a lot of party games during college. After a while, we got bored of most of them, so we decided to create our own. We released Out of Hand on Steam right after graduating in the summer of 2023. At that time, the game only supported local multiplayer, but most players wanted to play with their friends online. So, we spent the entire year of 2024 developing online multiplayer. We decided to release the game as Out of Hand: Deluxe since we made improvements to every aspect of the game along the way and felt it would be more fun to launch it as a whole new game rather than just updating an old one that probably no one remembers anymore.

Online and Local Multiplayer

Play online with your friends or with random people on the internet, or gather your friends in the couch and plug in some gamepads to play up to 8 players on the tv

Physics Based Hand

Use your hand to grab items around the map, then throw them at your friends

Physics Based Dodge Roll

Use the dodge roll feature to become a ragdoll at any time

And then combine them

Unlockable Outfits

Get different outfits by unlocking achievements

Tons Of Levels

Play on more than 40 unique levels with varied gameplay
